name: VR Wonderland: mini civilizations in a forest
name_original: VR Wonderland: mini civilizations in a forest
description:
When we were young, have we all dreamed of the world of mini humankind?
This game will satisfy your fantasy. You will become a man/woman smaller than a rabbit, going through time and space through a magical stone door, and come to the mini-world island.
You need to find your airship (though smaller than a rabbit), then find and visit other 4 mini human civilizations, while at the same time you will need to repel the attacks from a dragonfly army.
